title: NHL Stanley Cup 2025 Presentation Set

gallery.caption: Gloss black podium with chrome and LED accents
Wheel-mounted system for direct ice deployment

summary: Sub-5-minute deployment. Center ice transformation. The stage for hockey's most iconic moment. Mystic delivered fabrication and engineering for the ceremonial stage where Aleksander Barkov hoisted the Stanley Cup.
challenge: Full deployment required in under 5 minutes during a single commercial break. Ice presents unique stability and traction challenges. Design must frame the broadcast shot while not obstructing 19,000+ arena spectators.
approach: Mystic developed a fully modular stage system with wheel-mounted base for direct ice deployment. The 45ft wide Ã— 12.5ft tall structure features a central trophy podium with gloss black finish, 'Stanley Cup Champions' branded arch, and LED integration leveraging ice reflection.
result: Flawless ceremonial moment for the 2025 Stanley Cup Final, transforming center ice into a premium presentation venue during a single commercial break for Florida Panthers' back-to-back championship.
